description: This pathway depicts the downstream signaling of serotonin via receptors 4, 6, and 7, resulting in the activation of EGR1 and NR3C1.  Proteins on this pathway have targeted assays available via the [CPTAC Assay Portal](https://assays.cancer.gov/available_assays?wp_id=WP734)
title: Serotonin receptor 4/6/7 and NR3C signaling
